fields.name: interval
fields.description: Interval in seconds to stream data

fields.name: obsidianPath
fields.description: Path to the Obsidian vault where time entries will be saved

fields.name: customPrompt
fields.description: Custom prompt to use for the AI model

fields.name: gptModel
fields.description: OpenAI GPT model to use (e.g. gpt-4). If provided with openaiApiKey, OpenAI will be used instead of Ollama

fields.name: openaiApiKey
fields.description: OpenAI API key. If provided with gptModel, OpenAI will be used instead of Ollama

fields.name: ollamaApiUrl
fields.description: Ollama API URL. Used if openaiApiKey is not provided

fields.name: ollamaModel
fields.description: Ollama Model. Used if openaiApiKey is not provided

fields.name: pageSize
fields.description: Number of records to retrieve from Screenpipe per page
